content: **construction** fairisle friends are knit in one piece from the bottom-up simple sewing techniques are used to define the arms and legs after knitting fast and fun to knit these dolls are designed to be sturdy safe and perfect for even the littlest hands to hold **gauge** exact gauge is not important i recommend choosing a needle 2 or 3 sizes smaller than listed on the ball band to create a dense fabric that will keep the stuffing hidden * use a larger needle for stranded knitting if needed to maintain gauge **yarn** models are knit from a variety of dk oddments **abbreviations** co = cast on k = knit k2tog = knit 2 stitches together p = purl rs = right side st s = stitch es ws = wrong side **skills required** i designed these dolls as practice projects to improve my own stranded knitting skills there are many excellent tutorials on stranded knitting and knitting from a chart available online
